properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , GRADE_NO , TOTAL_SCORE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'U'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
